sentences.english: They are the hieroglyphics of feudalism succeeding those of theocracy .
sentences.chinese: 這是繼神權政治象形文字之後的封建制度象形文字。

sentences.english: In the colonies outside New England, no strict theocracies had been set up.
sentences.chinese: 新英格蘭以外的殖民地並沒有實行嚴格的神權統治。

sentences.english: Finally, law of the Mozi is "reverencing God and ghost" the god law.
sentences.chinese: 最後，墨子之法是“尊天事鬼”的神權法。
現在類似的神權政體甚至很難改掉。

sentences.english: Waterloo bears divine right on its crupper.
Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 從今以後，人子要坐在神權能的右邊。

sentences.english: The so-called government in exile founded by the Dalai Lama practices theocratic rule.
sentences.chinese: 達賴喇嘛建立的所謂流亡政府實行的是神權統治。

sentences.english: Everywhere religious authority totters as the peasant movement develops.
sentences.chinese: 神權的動搖，也是跟着農民運動的發展而普遍。

sentences.english: It is also significant that theocracy is not monolithic either.
sentences.chinese: 很重要的一點是，神權政治並非鐵板一塊。
